name: n8n-nodes-base.nocoDb
semantic_context: Read, update, write and delete data from NocoDB

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

version.name: version
version.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

workspaceId.name: workspaceId
workspaceId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
workspaceId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
projectId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

primaryKey.name: primaryKey

options.name: Default
options.description: Default, added when table was created from UI by those options: Create new table / Import from Excel / Import from CSV

options.name: Imported From Airtable
options.description: Select if table was imported from Airtable

options.name: Custom
options.description: When connecting to existing external database as existing primary key field is retained as is, enter the name of the primary key field below

primaryKey.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

id.name: id
id.description: The value of the ID field
id.ai_hint: The value of the ID field

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

downloadAttachments.name: downloadAttachments
downloadAttachments.description: Whether the attachment fields define in 'Download Fields' will be downloaded

downloadFieldNames.name: downloadFieldNames
downloadFieldNames.description: Name of the fields of type 'attachment' that should be downloaded. Multiple ones can be defined separated by comma. Case sensitive.
downloadFieldNames.ai_hint: Name of the fields of type 'attachment' that should be downloaded. Multiple ones can be defined separated by comma. Case sensitive.

options.name: options
viewId
options.description: The select fields of the returned rows

options.name: fields
options.description: The select fields of the returned rows

options.name: sort
options.description: The sorting rules for the returned rows

values.name: field
values.description: Name of the field to sort on

options.name: where
options.description: A formula used to filter rows

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

dataToSend.name: dataToSend

options.name: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns
options.description: Use when node input properties match destination column names

options.name: Define Below for Each Column
options.description: Set the value for each destination column

dataToSend.description: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row
dataToSend.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

info.displayName: This operation requires the primary key to be included for each row.
info.name: info

inputsToIgnore.name: inputsToIgnore
inputsToIgnore.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.
inputsToIgnore.ai_hint: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi

values.name: binaryData
values.description: Whether the field data to set is binary and should be taken from a binary property

values.name: binaryProperty
values.description: The field containing the binary file data to be uploaded

fieldsUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF @version == 1 THEN SHOW parameter 'version'
IF @version == 2 THEN SHOW parameter 'version'
IF @version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'version'
IF resource == 'row' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF version == 1 THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF version == 2 THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF version IN [2, 3] THEN SHOW parameter 'table'
IF version == 1 THEN SHOW parameter 'table'
IF version IN [1, 2] AND operation IN ["delete", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'primaryKey'
IF version == 3 AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'primaryKey'
IF version IN [1, 2] AND operation IN ["delete", "update"] AND primaryKey == 'custom' THEN SHOW parameter 'customPrimaryKey'
IF version == 3 AND operation == 'delete' AND primaryKey == 'custom' THEN SHOW parameter 'customPrimaryKey'
IF version IN [1, 2] AND operation IN ["delete", "get", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF version == 3 AND operation IN ["delete", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'downloadAttachments'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND downloadAttachments == True THEN SHOW parameter 'downloadFieldNames'
IF operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'downloadAttachments'
IF operation == 'get' AND downloadAttachments == True THEN SHOW parameter 'downloadFieldNames'
IF operation IN ["create", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'dataToSend'
IF dataToSend == 'autoMapInputData' THEN SHOW parameter 'info'
IF operation == 'update' AND version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'info'
IF operation IN ["create", "update"] AND dataToSend == 'autoMapInputData' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputsToIgnore'
IF operation IN ["create", "update"] AND dataToSend == 'defineBelow' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF binaryData == False THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldValue'
IF binaryData == True THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryProperty'
